title: Elegant Navaratna Kasu Mala Inspired Necklace
materials: Emerald. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This exquisite necklace features a modern take on the traditional Kasu Mala, incorporating intricately designed circular pendants, each studded with brilliant cut CZ diamonds. The center pendant highlights a striking rectangular Ruby complemented with emeralds on the adjacent pendants. Delicate gold balls, reminiscent of traditional Lakshmi Kasu, dangle gracefully from the center pendant, adding a touch of heritage. The openwork design of the pendants allows light to dance through the gems, creating a mesmerizing effect.
occasions: or special occasions like a Sangeet. Also suitable for contemporary formal events and festive celebrations like Ugadi or Sankranti.
description: This necklace seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. The brilliant cut diamonds provide exceptional sparkle, while the high-quality ruby and emeralds add a pop of color and value. The 22K gold ensures lasting beauty and investment value. Its delicate design makes it comfortable to wear while still making a statement. The subtle incorporation of Kasu elements pays homage to Telugu heritage.
